Sentencas: Suitable porous electrode design may play a significant role in the performance enhancement of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this paper a genetic algorithm optimization method is employed to design electrodes based on a 2D planar SOFC model development.
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The objective is to find suitable porosities and particle sizes distributions for both anode and cathode electrodes so that the cell performance can be maximized.
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that the optimized heterogeneous morphology may better improve SOFC performance than the homogeneous counterpart, particularly under relatively high current density conditions.
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The optimization results are dependent on the operating conditions.
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effects of inlet mass flow rates and fuel compositions are investigated.
Titulo: Microstructure Optimization Designs for Anode-Supported Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The proposed approach provides a systematical method for electrode microstructure designs of high performance SOFCs.
